site_name: Accord House, Ashley Road, Tottenham, London, N17 9AZ
description:
Non-Material Amendment to the application HGY/2022/0752 - Council Depot, Ashley Road, London, N17 9DP as approved on 31/08/2022 as: Full planning application for the erection of 272 homes including 50% socially rented homes extending 4-13 storeys, 174sqm of flexible Use Class E floorspace along with a new vehicular access to the site, car parking and two pedestrian north south routes. The proposal also includes both private and public hard and soft landscaping throughout the site.

Amendments sought are for the removal of stone features to the following areas:
1. Front Entrance Canopies
2. Balconies
3. And Brie Soliel facias
4. Capping of the pier at Block B2 at third floor level.
